name: Idol Dance: Dancing and Rhythm
description:
Like to get your groove on and dream about becoming a dance superstar?

Soak up the endless party vibes in the brand-new free mobile game Idol Dance! Dance off against other players to the sound of the world’s greatest hits, get ready for a crazy bash, hang out with friends, find true love, and explore the world of far-out fashion! Conquer the dance Olympus in Idol Dance!

Key features:

BECOME A DANCE FLOOR HEADLINER
Walk the path of a rising star, rocking out to the most popular tracks from around the globe! Challenge the competition to a dance battle or work together with your friends to form a dance group that will take the world by storm.

FIND TRUE LOVE
Use the quick search function to find new friends. Meet your crush, perform as a duo, exchange gifts, unlock couple effects and accessories, then arrange an in-game wedding ceremony!

INVENT A UNIQUE LOOK
Select from over a hundred outfits and accessories to suit every taste: become an icon of fashion and design your very own style! Express yourself through your character and experiment with their appearance to create an image that fits your current mood.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Hit the global chat to meet players from all over the world. Relax by the pool or host a house party in your very own room. Invite friends into the game to have fun and blow up the dance floor together!

CHOOSE YOUR DANCE MODE
Two intuitive control schemes: traditional arrows or dynamic bubbles. Pick the one that you like best to have even more fun in every dance off! Think you have what it takes to climb to the top of the charts and become a dance battle superstar?
